Apptentive | Senior Backend Engineer | {Seattle} | ONSITE, SALARY: Sr Market + Equity, https://www.apptentive.com/

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be responsible for the design, development, testing, and deployment of products that help companies communicate with their customers in deep and personal ways. We service over 1.5 million API requests per minute and our SDK is installed on over 1.3 billion devices around the world. We are a small team ~15 engineers and our technology stack is built with Ruby on Rails, Scala, and Python, running on Cassandra, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, and Kafka.

https://www.apptentive.com/about/careers/
